Title: Listening to Fear
Plot: The Summers women are at the hospital when the doctor informs Joyce she'll have surgery in two days. The rest of the gang go vampire slaying. Willow and Tara are camping out on the roof of a building watching the stars when a large object crashes down in Sunnydale. A mental patient who has been released from the hospital is walking through the forest when a creature attacks him. At the hospital, the creature climbs along the ceiling, undetected. Buffy and Joyce talk the doctor into letting Joyce
GuestStars: Barbara C. Adside, Debbie Lee Carrington, Paul Hayes, Keith Allan, Erin Leigh Price, April Adams, Nick Chinlund, Kevin Weisman, Randy Thompson
